alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 14 at 1:01PM EDT until July 14 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following county, Walton. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1200 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen in the last 6 Hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Rock Hill, Portland, New Home and Eucheeanna. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
